mapper.select: SELECT p.pay_no , p.requester , p.price , p.pay_dt , p.contract_no , p.virtual_account , r.request_no FROM pay p JOIN contract c ON p.contract_no = c.contract_no JOIN proposal pr ON c.contract_no = pr.proposal_no JOIN request r ON pr.proposal_no = r.request_no WHERE r.request_state = 'S02' ORDER BY p.pay_dt DESC
